about_the_game:
"INTERSECTION" is a gripping visual novel in the detective genre created by the international women's team HISYSgames.

Become Yoon Seunghyun, a young cadet starting his internship, and face a real, mysterious crime on your very first day. Immerse yourself in criminal intricacies by choosing one of many ways to develop the investigation, and see the world through Yoon's eyes.


  • Karma
The game is always watching… Your choices influence a hidden Karma system that determines whether characters become your friends or foes. Think carefully, because actions have consequences!


  • Leads
Your decisions determine the leads you uncover. Timing is crucial — finding a lead at the right moment can help you or hinder you.


  • Notebook
You can actively participate in the investigation and keep your own record of events. Use the Notebook to save interrogation notes, document important statements from suspects, track the progress of the investigation, and gather case materials.


  • Bromance ver & Romance ver
Want to be friendly with your partner, or maybe build a relationship? It's up to you — it won't impact the case.


  • Your choices REALLY matter.
Your decisions aren't just about solving the case. Every interaction you have with the characters, every decision you make shapes the story's ending.
